attributes.action: make it illegal for the NHS to use taxpayer funded premises or equipment to undertake lifestyle treatments such as IVF, breast reduction or augmentation, tattoo removal etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is insufficient funding in the NHS to provide life-saving treatment for people suffering from terminal diseases such as cancer - which afflicts people at random and about which they have no choice - so it cannot be right that one single penny should be spent on providing lifestyle treatment which usually results from a choice made by the person requesting the treatment.  Such self choice treatments need to be made unavailable, at any time, on the NHS.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
